participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, enjoys music and a healthy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i just bought a house recently. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and sociable, enjoys pets and helping others.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog. i am deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am a party animal.

content.text: i keep rocks for when i m working in fast food
